languages.text: "Говорят, она была одной из многих. Рожденная в пустоте. Подданная Домин. Почитающая не жизнь, но смерть, и гонимая за это. Говорят, она спасла флагман от вторжения {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g} во время варп-перелета, собрав вокруг себя служителей Его. И чтобы трагедии не повторилось, они начали плесть Кровавую паутину. Говорят, она была сильной женщиной с несгибаемой волей, но за годы ее сердце окаменело. И Неумирающий прошептал ее имя тому, кто стал первым Висирем Кровавой паутины".

"It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Together, they spun the first threads of the Web to ensure that such devastation would never happen again. It is said that she was strong and indomitable, but as the years passed, her heart became as stone. And thus the Undying One whispered her name to the one who would become the first Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, она была одной из многих. Рожденная в пустоте. Подданная Домин. Почитающая не жизнь, но смерть, и гонимая за это. traits.locale_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Enim's subject. She honoured death instead of life and was ostracised for it. It is said that, when the Archenemy's forces invaded the flagship during a fateful warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Together they wove the first threads of the Bloodspun Web to ensure that such devastation would not happen again. It is said that she was strong, indomitable, but as years passed, her heart became as stone. And thus the Undying One whispered her name to the one who would become the first Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web."

languages.text: «Se cuenta que fue una de muchos. Nacida en el vacío. Súbdita del Domin. Honraba la muerte en vez de la vida, y fue perseguida por ello. Se dice que, cuando las huestes del {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g} invadieron la nave insignia durante un salto de disformidad, congregó a los siervos del Inmortal y juntos salvaron la nave de la catástrofe. Entre todos urdieron los primeros hilos de la Red para garantizar que no volviese a ocurrir una calamidad semejante. Se dice que era fuerte e indómita, pero con el paso de los años su corazón se volvió duro como la piedra. Y así fue como el Inmortal susurró su nombre al que luego se convertiría en el primer Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta».
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Entre todos urdieron los primeros hilos de la Red para garantizar que no volviese a ocurrir una calamidad semejante. Y así fue como el Inmortal susurró su nombre al que luego se convertiría en el primer Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta».

languages.text: 「彼女は大勢の中の一人だったらしい。虚空生まれ。ドミンの臣下。生ではなく死を尊んだことで迫害された。ワープジャンプ中に{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}の軍勢が旗艦へと侵攻してきたとき、彼女は不死の者の従者たちを集め、船を破滅から救ったと言われている。そのような惨劇を二度と起こさせないために、彼らはともにウェブの最初の糸を紡ぎ上げた。彼女は強く、不屈の精神を持っていたと言われているが、年月が経つにつれ、その心は石のようになった。このようにして、不死の者はブラッドスパン・ウェブの最初のヴィジールとなる者に彼女の名を囁いた」
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Together, they spun the first threads of the Web to ensure that such devastation would never happen again. It is said that she was strong and indomitable, but as the years passed, her heart became as stone. And thus the Undying One whispered her name to the one who would become the first Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は大勢の中の一人だったらしい。虚空生まれ。ドミンの臣下。生ではなく死を尊んだことで迫害された。ワープジャンプ中に{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}の軍勢が旗艦へと侵攻してきたとき、彼女は不死の者の従者たちを集め、船を破滅から救ったと言われている。そのような惨劇を二度と起こさせないために、彼らはともにウェブの最初の糸を紡ぎ上げた。彼女は強く、不屈の精神を持っていたと言われているが、年月が経つにつれ、その心は石のようになった。このようにして、不死の者はブラッドスパン・ウェブの最初のヴィジールとなる者に彼女の名を囁いた」

languages.text: “我们的创始人据说是众者之中的一员。她在虚空中诞生，是秘者的臣民。她厌弃生命，崇拜死亡，也因此遭到了迫害。据说，某次亚空间跳跃期间，{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的军队侵入了旗舰之中。那个时候，她将不死之神的仆人召集起来，保护这艘舰船免于毁灭的命运。在那之后，众人共同编织了罗网的第一缕丝线，确保这样的灾难再也不会发生。据说她曾是个坚韧不屈的人，而随着岁月的流逝，她的心智也渐渐变得如同铁石一般。在那之后，不死之神通过低语，将她的名字告诉了她的继任者，也就是织血罗网的第一任宿老。”
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Together, they spun the first threads of the Web to ensure that such devastation would never happen again. It is said that she was strong and indomitable, but as the years passed, her heart became as stone. And thus the Undying One whispered her name to the one who would become the first Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: “我们的创始人据说是众者之中的一员。她在虚空中诞生，是秘者的臣民。她厌弃生命，崇拜死亡，也因此遭到了迫害。据说，某次亚空间跳跃期间，{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的军队侵入了旗舰之中。那个时候，她将不死之神的仆人召集起来，保护这艘舰船免于毁灭的命运。在那之后，众人共同编织了罗网的第一缕丝线，确保这样的灾难再也不会发生。据说她曾是个坚韧不屈的人，而随着岁月的流逝，她的心智也渐渐变得如同铁石一般。在那之后，不死之神通过低语，将她的名字告诉了她的继任者，也就是织血罗网的第一任宿老。”

languages.text: "Sie soll eine von vielen gewesen sein. Geboren in der Leere. Untertanin des Domin. Sie verehrte den Tod anstatt das Leben und wurde deswegen verfolgt. Es heißt, sie habe bei einem Angriff der Truppen des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeindes{/g} auf das Flaggschiff während eines Warpsprungs die Diener des Todlosen um sich geschart und dadurch das Schiff gerettet. Gemeinsam sponnen sie die ersten Fäden des Netzes, um dafür zu sorgen, dass eine solche Verwüstung nie wieder geschieht. Sie soll stark und unbezwingbar gewesen sein, aber mit den Jahren bekam sie ein Herz aus Stein. Und so flüsterte der Todlose ihren Namen dem künftigen ersten Wesir des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zu."
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Es heißt, sie habe bei einem Angriff der Truppen des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeindes{/g} auf das Flaggschiff während eines Warpsprungs die Diener des Todlosen um sich geschart und dadurch das Schiff gerettet. languages.text: « On dit qu'elle n'était qu'un individu parmi tant d'autres. Un sujet {mf|du|de la} Domin, né dans le néant, qui honorait la mort plutôt que la vie, ce qui lui a valu maintes persécutions. On raconte aussi que, quand les armées du {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g} ont envahi le vaisseau amiral à la faveur d'un saut Warp, elle a fait appel aux serviteurs de l'Immortel et sauvé le bâtiment de la ruine. Ensemble, ils ont tissé les premiers fils de la Toile afin de veiller à ce qu'un tel désastre ne se reproduise plus jamais. Elle avait la réputation d'être forte et indomptable, mais au fil des années, son cœur se serait par trop endurci, raison pour laquelle l'Immortel aurait murmuré son nom à celui qui était appelé à devenir le premier vizir de notre culte. »
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin. Together, they spun the first threads of the Web to ensure that such devastation would never happen again. It is said that she was strong and indomitable, but as the years passed, her heart became as stone. And thus the Undying One whispered her name to the one who would become the first Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web."

languages.text: "Denir ki o, nicesinden biriymiş. Uçsuzda doğmuş. Dominin kuluymuş. Yaşamdan ziyade ölüme saygı duyarmış, bu yüzden de zulme uğramış. Denir ki bir öte sıçrama sırasında {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} güçleri sancak gemisini istila ettiğinde Örümcek Kraliçe, Ölmeyen'in tüm hizmetkârlarını etrafına toplayıp gemiyi kurtarmış. Böylesi bir yıkımın bir daha tekrarlanmaması için Ağ'ın ilk ipliklerini birlikte dokumuşlar. Örümcek Kraliçe, güçlü ve boyun eğmez birisiymiş ama yıllar geçtikçe kalbi taş kesilmiş. Bu yüzden de Ölmeyen, Kanipi Ağı'nın ilk Vezir'i olacak kişiye onun adını fısıldamış."
languages.original_text: "It is said that she was one of many. Born in the void. The Domin's subject. She honoured death instead of life, and for this she was persecuted. It is said that when the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}'s forces invaded the flagship during a warp jump, she gathered the Undying One's servants around her and saved the ship from ruin.
